room_title: Escape room "The One with the Dragon" by Baker Street Escapes in Oklahoma City
review: We had such a great time! We had 8 friends and chose 'The One With the Dragon'. The guys were awesome and super helpful every step of the way- from booking the group session to showing us around afterwards. We will definitely be back!!

room_title: Escape room "The One with the Dragon" by Baker Street Escapes in Oklahoma City
review: This place was just fantastic. We did the dragon treasure room and loved every second. We will definitely be back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The One with the Dragon" by Baker Street Escapes in Oklahoma City
review: Andrew was friendly and helpful. We loved the Dragon room. And we actually finished it (there were 5 of us)! I definitely recommend this place. The decor and props really made the adventure.
